    Introduction

    HELPS is designed to translate climate projections to heat-induced labor productivity loss by sectors.

    Back to Contents


    Citation

    Back to Contents


    Installation Guides

    1. Download and install:

      • R (https://www.r-project.org/)
      • R studio (https://www.rstudio.com/)

    2. Open R studio:

    install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('dsheng1026/HELPS')

    Back to Contents


    How-to Guides

    • Package vignette

    Back to Contents


    User Notice

    HELPS, by default, works with 0.5-degree daily and monthly bias corrected climate projections.

    Back to Contents
